title: Inactivity warning says 6 days, but already lost lps.
body: I havent played soloqueue is a while since i dotn enjoy it much. Last time i left the account after i won the first promo game to d4. Now is showing me the message saying that i have 6 days to become active, but somehow im in 90 lps..... meaning that i lost the promos that i was 1-0 and also lost 10 points out of nowhere..... Could you please someone in riot explain me that? Thanks.

replies.body: I just had a look at that link and doesnt say anything about promo games, and pretty sure that happened a little after 2 weeks, so that 5 days rule didnt applied in this case. this might be an error on the system or something.
Thank you for the reply, the funny thing is, lasted more than 2 weeks for the promo to expire not 5 days, so im even more confused now. lol

For Diamond and Mastery promotion series, you have 5 days to complete it before it expires and you drop out. I don't know how much LP the drop you (if it's 10 or is normal decay) but it's separate from the 28 days required before you start to incur inactivity decay.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q4
bump. Any riot mod can help me with this? i want me promo game back please.
